content:
Hello everybody!
It says in the Use Cases that a care provider wants to receive information also about the specimen (not only patient information and so on). Actually it is mentioned twice in the Use Cases. Since there is no specimen in the Lab..Norway-Resources we've been asking us whether we understood that correctly? There cannot be a need to show the user specimen information, right?
Oops my mistake. I simplified the assignment, but forgot to alter the text. I'll update it this afternoon. So please, don't bother with the specimen. Sorry for the confusion!

I found another "bug" in the LabDiagnosticReportNorway2 profile: the result reference is pointing to the wrong profile. It's linked to Reference(LabObservationNorway2) and should be: https://simplifier.net/DevDaysStudents2016/LabObservationNorway3
So the current link is pointing to the "real" norwegan profile, where it should point to the simplified StudentTrack Observation profile
